actions.text: Amendment SA 397 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 62. Record Vote Number: 100.

Amendment SA 397 proposed by Senator Kerry. (consideration:  CR S4366-4367; text:  CR S4366-4367) To provide for a $150 billion revenue stimulus for fiscal years 2003 and 2004 without adding to the long-term debt.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 397 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 62. Record Vote Number: 100.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 397 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 62. Record Vote Number: 100.

purpose: To provide for a $150 billion revenue stimulus for fiscal years 2003 and 2004 without adding to the long-term debt.
